opponent.label: Queen of Hatred
opponent.description: Also known as The Queen of Hearts, The Queen of Hatred is the second-youngest of four magical girls dedicated to protecting their city and world from the forces of evil. Currently residing in the monster exploitation facility known as Lobotomy Corp, she continues her prosecution of villainy despite frequent spells of amnesia and a near irrational sense of good and evil. In the name of Love and Justice, here comes The Magical Girl!
opponent.default-costume-name: In the Name of Love and Hate
